fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Spray DDT on two players' houses every night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Sprayed players will gain Conversion Immunity, until they are visited, upon which the Spray is removed.
- Players capable of converting will be dealt an Unstoppable Attack if they visit a Sprayed player
- Other players will be roleblocked upon visiting a Sprayed player.
- Conversion immunity by default. Additionally, you will attack any players capable of converting whom visit you.
- Basic Defense until no conversion capable players are alive. You will regain this if any are ressurected.
